title: Permanent residence cards (Green Card, ILR, PR)
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, residence status, card number, biometrics
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Residence status (valid/expired/revoked). Link to immigration authority system (employers and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake permanent residence cards. Domain binding verifies immigration authority. Employment eligibility verification (I-9). Benefits eligibility. Travel document. Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy). High-value fraud target.
